data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lima, Silvio Felipe Barbosa, Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey (2014): New species of Gregorioiscala and Opalia (Caenogastropoda: Epitoniidae) in the Western Atlantic: a case of republication. Zootaxa 3835 (3): 392-396, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.3.9
